alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Hill; Johnson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 10:54PM CDT until June 11 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN JOHNSON...NORTHEASTERN BOSQUE AND NORTHWESTERN HILL COUNTIES... At 1053 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blum, or 12 miles south of Cleburne, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cleburne, Hillsboro, Keene, Whitney, Itasca, Grandview, Blum, Covington, Cleburne State Park, Lake Pat Cleburne, Lake Whitney State Park, Lake Whitney, Parker, Rio Vista, Retreat, Coyote Flats, Cedar Shores, Lakewood Harbor, Sand Flat and Eulogy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
